posts.name: Max Radermacher
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.75 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Now you can tap on a name in the calls tab to view additional information instead of immediately starting a new call with that contact. There’s still a shortcut to quickly call someone back too, but whether or not you use it is entirely your call.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.74 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.75.0.977-beta

58 new commits since 7.74.0.971-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.75 [1]

  • Quick fixes for registering Backup-ID [2]

  • Don't undo changes applied by list media fullsize handling [3]

  • Remove chevrons when new VC isn't pushed onto the stack [4]

  • Basic UI infrastructure for polls [5]

  • Action sheet cleanup [6]

  • Always use web sockets in the notification service [7]

  • Update action sheet style [8]

  • Ensure we always register Backup-ID, if necessary, before fetching Backup auth [9]

  • Update libsignal to v0.79.0 [10]

  • Round trip OutgoingMessageDetails.dateReceived in backup proto [11]

  • Remove concept of "V1" 2FA, clean up OWS2FAManager [12]

  • Rework "PIN enabled/disabled" checks [13]

  • Acquire a Backups entitlement before fetching Backup auth credentials [14]

  • Adjust comments re: sequencing Backup entitlement redemption [15]

  • Restructure Backup auth credential deps to rethrow errors descriptively [16]

  • Don’t use the web socket for registerBackupId [17]

  • Fix version check crash [18]

  • Never round OWSProgress up to 100% [19]

  • Reuse a single NSURLSession per cdn connection with the same configuration [20]

  • Retry media tier 5xx errors [21]

  • Add an error sheet to failed QuickRestore bootstrap [22]

  • propagate cancellation to upload/download queue child tasks via async let instead of task init [23]

  • Run BackupAuthCredential dependency steps serially, rethrow first error [24]

  • Skip attempting AppAttest in dev builds [25]

  • Don't attempt to retry if 'skip restore' error encountered. [26]

  • Remove dbForReadTx/dbForWriteTx [27]

  • Rename devices → deviceIds [28]

  • Adjust strings re: TestFlight [29]

  • Remove custom header/footer size canary [30]

  • Set requiresExternalPower for backups BGProcessingTask [31]

  • Push network and 5xx error handling into BackupAttachmentDownloadStatus [32]

  • Don't count thumbnails in upload progress [33]

  • Don't count thumbnails in download progress [34]

  • Handle conflicts when sending with sender keys [35]

  • Add web socket support when unlinking a device [36]

  • Use the web socket immediately after registration [37]

  • Add AccountEntropyPoolManager [38]

  • Only consider one key type when fetching Backup auth credentials [39]

  • Pared-down BackupServiceAuth fetching during registration [40]

  • Lock accesses to URLSession task creation to avoid duplicate taskIdentifiers [41]

  • Mark a successful launch if we reach applicationWillTerminate [42]

  • Fan out messages to unregistered recipients [43]

  • Use an extended timeout for delete-Backups requests [44]

  • Use native styles for OWSTableViewController2 [45]

  • Rotate the SS recordIkm when rotating the AEP [46]

  • Update done bar buttons on iOS 26 [47]

  • Fix some All Media layout on iPadOS 26 [48]

  • Avoid side-effects and restrictions of AEP rotation during Reg [49]

  • Start adopting account existence check [50]

  • Remove throws from thing that can’t throw [51]

  • Add backup list media integrity check button to internal settings [52]

  • Polls proto changes [53]

  • Disable global network browsing for backups enabled builds [54]

  • Remove noisy debug log line [55]

  • Notify user 1-3 hours after they enable backups [56]

  • Update release notes [57]

  • Update translations [58]

Why the chats background are gray now. It’s look awful.

IMG_28121179×2407 114 KB

posts.name: Delamcode
posts.cooked: My guess is broken iOS 26 theming. Also note the bottom bar flashes when switching to calls on app start
My mind already included the radii haha

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked: What happened with the grey around the chats?

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Sorry about this – this is a bug we’re sorting out now. We’ll push another beta once we’ve fixed it.

posts.name: link ✦
posts.cooked:
unsure if this is related to the beta, but have been having increased amount of issues with downloading (and probably uploading) attachments since around this beta

they don’t download most of the time, failing as soon as i tap the retry button, but then sometimes the same attachment works just fine

have tried a variety of network configurations

i’m on iOS 26 beta as well

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.75.0/e1e08759648f1ab3c82588e7d83285565f4f247aef91a89273d596beadeea498.zip

edit: downgraded, seems to work now, so likely a regression

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.74.0/c521b09e2aa44310db4ff4cdac3082057938b017feba1b88a7681246d6bd9834.zip

posts.name: link ✦

Not beta, but a specific sticker pack won’t animate for my friend:

Log

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.73.1/19cf2d7c2916b2428bca5196151d078355473bef9ca96bfbc65b00c968eedfb0.zip

I noticed some issues with „xyz joined Signal“ notifications: my Android friends got them while I didn’t and my iOS friends also didn’t get them.

edit: yes, I activated this notifications in the settings
Just to be sure; do you have Contact Joins Signal (Settings > Notifications > Notify when…) turned on?

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Interesting. If you upgrade again do you see continued degraded attachment behavior? We’re not experiencing this internally, although we had an issue that was fixed just before the beta was cut.

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Asking because the logs show lots of internet connection issues at the OS level. We have been working on network-related topics, so any details you can provide about your network configuration (e.g., Signal proxy, system VPN, censorship circumvention enabled, etc.) would be helpful.

posts.name: link ✦
posts.cooked: replied privately in https://community.signalusers.org/t/35733/21

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.76 release.
